summary: This film describes the events surrounding a 1975 shootout at the Pine Ridge reservation in S. Dakota where two FBI agents were killed.
cast: Norman Zigrossi|Robert Sikma|Darelle 'Dino' Butler|Bob Robideau|Norman Brown|Leonard Peltier|Duane Brewer|Calvin Jumping Bull|William Muldrow|Dennis Banks|James Abourezk|Sam Loud Hawk|Richard Wilson|Severt Young Bear Sr.|John Trudell|Kenneth Tilsen|Russell Means|William Kunstler|William Janklow|Deborah White Plume|Bernice White Hawk|Jeanette Eagle Hawk|Beau Little Sky|Madonna Thunder Hawk|Wallace Little Jr.|Nilak Butler|Wilma Blacksmith|Kenny Loud Hawk|Morris Wounded|Lou Bean|Billy Bean|Russell Loud Hawk|Edward McManus|Bruce Ellison|John Lowe|Robert Bolin|Lynn Crooks|Evan Hultman|Myrtle Poor Bear|Warren Allmand|Gerald Heaney|Robert Ecoffey|Clarence Kelley|Jean Bordeaux|Marquetta Peltier|Robert Redford
title: Incidente en Ongala
